Class Log.Builder

  • java.lang.Object

    public static class Log.Builder
extends Builder<Log>
    Raft log builder.

    • Method Detail

      • withDirectory

        public Log.Builder withDirectory(String directory)
        Sets the log directory, returning the builder for method chaining.

        The log will write segment files into the provided directory. It is recommended that a unique directory be dedicated for each unique log instance.

        Parameters:
        directory - The log directory.
        Returns:
        The log builder.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - If the directory is null

      • withDirectory

        public Log.Builder withDirectory(File directory)
        Sets the log directory, returning the builder for method chaining.

        The log will write segment files into the provided directory. It is recommended that a unique directory be dedicated for each unique log instance.

        Parameters:
        directory - The log directory.
        Returns:
        The log builder.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - If the directory is null

      • withStorageLevel

        public Log.Builder withStorageLevel(StorageLevel level)
        Sets the log storage level.

        The storage level dictates how entries in the log are persisted. By default, the StorageLevel.DISK level is used to persist entries to disk.

        Parameters:
        level - The storage level.
        Returns:
        The log builder.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - If the level is null

      • withMaxEntrySize

        public Log.Builder withMaxEntrySize(int maxEntrySize)
        Sets the maximum entry size, returning the builder for method chaining.

        The maximum entry size will be used to place an upper limit on the size of log segments.

        Parameters:
        maxEntrySize - The maximum entry size.
        Returns:
        The log builder.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If the maxEntrySize is not positive

      • withMaxSegmentSize

        Returns:
        The log builder.
        Throws:
